game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: Embark on an epic adventure to uncover the long-lost treasure of the legendary pirate captain Blackbeard. Solve puzzles, overcome challenges, and navigate through treacherous lands to reach the final destination.

tasks.description: Search for a hidden map that reveals the location of the pirate treasure.
Explore the ancient temple and retrieve the key that unlocks the treasure's chamber.

tasks.objective: Solve the riddle of the sphinx
tasks.description: Face the enigmatic sphinx and solve its riddle to gain passage to the treasure's resting place.
Survive the dangerous jungle filled with traps, wild beasts, and hostile natives.
Unearth the secret entrance to the underground cavern where the treasure awaits.
Outwit the ancient guardian spirit to gain access to the treasure chamber.
Finally, reach the treasure chamber and claim the valuable artifacts and gold coins left behind by Blackbeard.
